title: Energy Efficient Building - means a building compliant with the provisions of Energy Conservation Building Code (ECBC)
clause_text: Energy Efficient Building - means a building compliant with the provisions of Energy Conservation Building Code (ECBC). Existing Building or use - means a building, structure orpremises or its use existing on ground.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Energy Efficient Building - means a building compliant with the provisions of Energy Conservation Building Code (ECBC).
